notesStmt.note: Defective at the beginning and at the end. A number of pages stained. Folio 1 much damaged.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Volume 3 of a portion of the Palestinian Talmud, with a commentary by Solomon ben Joseph Sirillo.

collation.p: Quires of originally 8 leaves each. Defective at the beginning and at the end.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental square and semi-cursive script of the 16th century.

binding.p: Post-1600. Black leather. Spine title: 'Talmud Jerushalmi. Hebrew. Vol. III. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2824.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: J. J. Leep (al. Bril): purchased from him by the British Museum on 17 January 1885: inscribed, folio [181v] .
